```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}

library(rDIAUtils)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(DBI)

conn <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), 'testData/normalize_db/data.db3')
dat.precursor <- dbGetQuery(conn, 'SELECT
                                      r.replicate,
                                      p.modifiedSequence,
                                      p.precursorCharge,
                                      p.totalAreaFragment,
                                      p.normalizedArea
                                   FROM precursors p
                                   LEFT JOIN replicates r on r.replicateId == p.replicateId')
dbDisconnect(conn)
dat$replicate <- make.names(dat$replicate)
```
